sentence.Network_en: Mr. Tremaine was proud in the possession of the kapok mattress.

sentence.Network_en: As all we know, kapok is the city flower of Guangzhou.

means.word_mean: 1. from the kapok tree; used for stuffing and insulation
2. massive tropical tree with deep ridges on its massive trunk and bearing large pods of seeds covered with silky floss; source of the silky kapok fiber
